entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
